grokIntegration.apiKey.description: üîë Your xAI API key for accessing Grok AI. You must have an account with credits purchased at https://console.x.ai and be part of a team.
grokIntegration.apiKey.markdownDescription: Your xAI API key for accessing Grok AI. **Requirements:** You must have an account with credits purchased ([console.x.ai](https://console.x.ai)) and be part of a team. **Get your API key:** [console.x.ai](https://console.x.ai)

grokIntegration.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens for Grok responses. The extension estimates token usage before sending a request and will prompt you if your request is large. Increase for longer answers, decrease to save usage. 1 token ‚âà 4 characters.
grokIntegration.maxTokens.markdownDescription: Maximum number of tokens for Grok responses. The extension estimates token usage before sending a request and will prompt you if your request is large. Increase for longer answers, decrease to save usage. **Tip:** 1 token ‚âà 4 characters.

grokIntegration.model.description: Grok model name to use for completions. You must have access to the selected model. Check the latest available models at https://console.x.ai and update this setting as needed.
grokIntegration.model.markdownDescription: Grok model name to use for completions. **Requirements:** You must have access to the selected model (see your team at [console.x.ai](https://console.x.ai)). **Check the latest available models:** [console.x.ai](https://console.x.ai)) and update this setting as needed.

grokIntegration.enableCache.description: Enable response caching to improve performance and reduce API calls for repeated requests.

grokIntegration.cacheMaxItems.description: Maximum number of cached responses to store in memory. Higher values use more memory but provide better cache hit rates.
grokIntegration.cacheMaxItems.markdownDescription: Maximum number of cached responses to store in memory. **Range:** 10-1000 items. Higher values use more memory but provide better cache hit rates.

grokIntegration.cacheTtlMinutes.description: How long to keep cached responses (in minutes) before they expire. Set lower for more fresh responses, higher for better performance.
grokIntegration.cacheTtlMinutes.markdownDescription: How long to keep cached responses (in minutes) before they expire. **Range:** 1-1440 minutes (24 hours). Set lower for more fresh responses, higher for better performance.

grokIntegration.tokenMultiplier.description: Multiplier for token estimation. Increase if you're hitting token limits frequently, decrease for more accurate estimates.
